docs.abstract: Dr Thompson on the charge of extortion
docs.lead_paragraph: SAILING OF THE VANDERBILT STEAMER NORTHERN LIGHT-RIOT AMONG THE COAL PASSERS AND FIREMEN.-There was considerable disturbance at the dock upon the departure of the Nurthern Light on Saturday, occasioned by a strike among the coalpassers and firemen, whese wages had been suddenly reduced by the proprietors of the line-the firemen from $25 to $20 per month, and the coal-passers from $20 to $17 per month.
